component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
header false java.lang.String Header text of the panel
footer false java.lang.String Footer text of the panel
toggleable false java.lang.Boolean false Makes the panel toggleable, places a toggle icon for user interaction
toggleSpeed false java.lang.Integer 1000 Durating of toggling in milliseconds. Default is 1000.
style false java.lang.String Style of the main container of panel.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container of panel.
collapsed false java.lang.Boolean false Renders a toggleable panel as collapsed by default.
closable false java.lang.Boolean false Makes the panel closable, places a close icon for user interaction
closeListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void closeListener(org.primefaces.event.CloseEvent) A server side listener to process a CloseEvent
onCloseUpdate false java.lang.String Id(s) of components to update after ajax closeListener is processed and panel is closed
onCloseStart false java.lang.String Javascript event handler to be triggered before a panel is closed
onCloseComplete false java.lang.String Javascript event handler to be triggered after a panel is closed
closeSpeed false java.lang.Integer 1000 Durating of closing in milliseconds. Default is 1000.
visible false java.lang.Boolean true Specifies visibility of panel.
onToggleUpdate false java.lang.String Id(s) of components to update after ajax toggleListener is processed and panel is toggled
toggleListener false javax.el.MethodExpression void toggleListener(org.primefaces.event.CloseEvent) A server side listener to process a CloseEvent
